movies.Title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
movies.Writer: Chris Weitz (screenplay by), Tony Gilroy (screenplay by), John Knoll (story by), Gary Whitta (story by), George Lucas (based on characters created by)
movies.Actors: Felicity Jones, Diego Luna, Alan Tudyk, Donnie Yen
movies.Plot: The daughter of an Imperial scientist joins the Rebel Alliance in a risky move to steal the Death Star plans.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 23 wins & 78 nominations.

movies.Title: Toy Story 3
movies.Writer: John Lasseter (story by), Andrew Stanton (story by), Lee Unkrich (story by), Michael Arndt (screenplay by)
movies.Actors: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Ned Beatty
movies.Plot: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

movies.Title: Shrek
movies.Writer: William Steig (based upon the book by), Ted Elliott, Terry Rossio, Joe Stillman, Roger S.H. Schulman, Cody Cameron (additional dialogue), Chris Miller (additional dialogue), Conrad Vernon (additional dialogue)
movies.Actors: Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, John Lithgow
movies.Plot: After his swamp is filled with magical creatures, Shrek agrees to rescue Princess Fiona for a villainous lord in order to get his land back.

movies.Title: Lethal Weapon
movies.Actors: Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Gary Busey, Mitchell Ryan
movies.Plot: Two newly paired cops who are complete opposites must put aside their differences in order to catch a gang of drug smugglers.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 1 nomination.

movies.Title: The Simpsons Movie
movies.Writer: James L. Brooks (screenplay), Matt Groening (screenplay), Al Jean (screenplay), Ian Maxtone-Graham (screenplay), George Meyer (screenplay), David Mirkin (screenplay), Mike Reiss (screenplay), Mike Scully (screenplay), Matt Selman (screenplay), John Swartzwelder (screenplay), Jon Vitti (screenplay), Joel H. Cohen (consultant writer), John Frink (consultant writer), Tim Long (consultant writer), Michael Price (consultant writer)
movies.Actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
movies.Plot: After Homer accidentally pollutes the town's water supply, Springfield is encased in a gigantic dome by the EPA and the Simpson family are declared fugitives.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 5 wins & 33 nominations.
